welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Raamsdonksveer, the charming city known for its picturesque canals and friendly locals. We invite you to explore our beautiful city and enjoy all it has to offer. Happy travels!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Gilze-Rijen Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free wifi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for regional flights and low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Eindhoven Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for low-cost airlines and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Woensdrecht Airport handles all commercial flights and services.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Woensdrecht Airport is used for all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi access is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Zoersel Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Zoersel Airport, handling all air freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
